snippet: Israeli troops killed two civilians and wounded at least 25 after an explosion targeted an Israeli military vehicle on Israel’s border with Gaza, Palestinian officials and witnesses said.
abstract: Palestinian militants fire antitank missile at Israeli military jeep patrolling Israel's border with Gaza; five Palestinians, including four civilians, are killed when Israel returns fire with tank or artillery shells.

byline.original: By FARES AKRAM and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Fares Akram reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Israeli troops killed two civilians and wounded at least 25 after an explosion targeted an Israeli military vehicle on Israel’s border with Gaza, Palestinian officials and witnesses said.

headline.seo: Israelis and Palestinians Trade Fire on Gaza Border
